attributes.action: compel Post Office Ltd. to withdraw immediately their proposals to close numerous Post Offices in Brighton and Hove.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the Government and Post Office Ltd. should withdraw immediately their proposals to close Post Offices at Elm Grove, Trafalgar Street, 13 Preston Road, 221 Preston Road, Brighton, and Richardson Road, Hove, which play such an important part in the life of the local community. The Post Office provides an invaluable and local service to local residents, many of them older people and young families who need the many essential services provided by the Post Office close at hand. If the Government truly believes in building sustainable communities, it will withdraw this and other post office closure proposals.
attributes.creator_name: Cllr Bill Randall, Cllr Ian Davey & Cllr Amy Kennedy

rejection.details: The Government does not have proposals to close specigic post offices. These are business decisions taken internally by the Post Office.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
